original_text: But the Lord is the only true God. He is the God who is alive. He is the King who rules for ever. When he is angry, the earth shakes. None of the nations can stop his anger. But the Lord is the only true God.
korean_text: 오직 여호와는 참 하나님이시요 살아 계신 하나님이시요 영원한 왕이시라 그 진노하심에 땅이 진동하며 그 분노하심을 이방이 능히 당하지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord is the only true God.
He is the God who is alive.
He is the King who rules for ever.
When he is angry, the earth shakes.
None of the nations can stop his anger.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 민족도 그의 진노를 막을 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the Lord is the only true God.
